body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky farmer. Married Mary Lindsay. Father of Charles Lindsay, Mary A. Lindsay, John Lindsay, Thomas P. Lindsay, Alexander C. Lindsay, Jr., Annie Lindsay, and Joe Lindsay. Farmer in Hancock County in 1850 and 1860.
